8d5f41b7-3090-4ea4-a5c7-0959a3391e99.description: Earners of the Power BI Series should have developed a core understanding of how to use Power BI. Candidates have learned how to transform data, use Power query, create measures and developed an understanding of DAX.

1992672c-5236-4060-a62a-9b8c8b00fedc.description: Earners of the SharePoint series have learnt how to build secure and accessible sites within their organisation. They have learnt how to populate and navigate to lists, libraries and pages, and to effectively manage, store, and protect information. This includes making documents easier to find using taxonomy, using content types to standardise document creation, upgrading security through sensitivity permissions, and using retention labels to control the editing & deletion of files.
